name: Any Artist Art
description:
Alora runs a gallery. She's so close to everything she's ever dreamed of when her rivals spiteful sister sabotages her.

She refuses to give up and takes to the town to find art for her gallery. The agent will be back in two months, so Alora has to move fast.

This was actually down to the wire. I had minutes to get this up. ^^;

This game ISN'T done. Sprites will be added to the conversations and real endings will be put in. Also the big paintings will have their placeholder art replaced.

All writing is a first draft, so I'd like to rework that to sound more natural too.

Everything in the game was written and drawn by me. The one song is credited in the about section on the main menu.
